data.name: EmbeddedExpert.io
data.about: EmbeddedExpertIO represents a vibrant collective... [rest of text]

metadata.title: About EmbeddedExpert.io

questions.question: What is EmbeddedExpert.io?
questions.answer: EmbeddedExpertIO represents a vibrant collective dedicated to the mastery of sophisticated embedded systems software development for professionals. EmbeddedExpertIO stands as a premier source of tailored embedded systems development courses, catering to individuals and enterprises seeking to hone or acquire embedded firmware programming expertise. Our extensive course selections encompass beginner to advanced levels, addressing diverse facets of embedded systems development, such as WiFi, STM32, IoT systems design, memory safeguarding, and beyond. Our core objective is to equip individuals and organizations with the indispensable skills to thrive in the swiftly evolving embedded systems sector. We achieve this by providing immersive, hands-on education under the guidance of seasoned industry specialists. Our ambition is to emerge as the favored learning platform for embedded systems development professionals across the globe

questions.question: How can I enroll in a course?
questions.answer: You can enroll in a course by visiting our website, selecting the course you are interested in, and following the enrollment instructions provided.

questions.question: Do you offer certificates for course completion?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer certificates upon successful completion of our courses.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other online payment options.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day refund policy if you are not satisfied with the course.

data.title: Realtime Operating Systems Proficiency Test
data.description: Prepare comprehensively for Embedded Software Engineer roles with our RTOS proficiency test.

reviews.review: Israel is a great instructor. Every step is explained not only what to do but why. I would recommend this course over any other.

course.title: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™ (STM32)

reviews.review: I thought this was going to be a course that followed another book, but when he directed us to the user/dev documentation to find answers, I saw this was something special. Problem-solving should always be at the focus of any programming course, even above syntaxt and technology. Very good start to this course.

Explanation is really good but could go deeper into some stuff. Especially for beginners like me it is hard to understand some topics which I never heard before. But like many courses they don´t share their slides which is really a shame since udemy also blocked the screenshot function it is really hard and unnecessary complex to take notes.

This course is amazing. It takes you from absolute beginner to expert in programming STM32 MCU. It taught you all the basic especially reading the reference manual. I highly recommend the instructor if you would like to learn about embedded systems.

Very enlightening and eye opening .I always wondered about how different logic gates come together to create a microarchitecture and then and instruction set and then and then a full fledged architecture like ARM . This course has been able to explain all of that. Looking forward to the rest of the course.

metadata.context: Technologies covered in our embedded systems courses

testimonials.quote: The courses are excellent and have helped me gain valuable skills and secure a freelancing business.

All the courses I took are great! In all of them I learned new and useful things that I use in my personal projects, and also they helped me to achieve a job as a software embedded engineer. Also, I'm still taking them to learn new things and improve my skills in embedded systems.

The material offered by your courses is one of the most systematic and easily understandable for beginners. I would also like to note that only your courses cover a large range of topics from Embedded Software Development and Embedded Systems itself.
I have done several of the EmbeddedExpertIO courses. I have enjoyed all of them and gained valuable additional knowledge and skills. Has helped me to obtain more work in my freelancing business.

Thanks to Israel's course, I discovered my passion for STM32 microcontrollers and have found true love in it. I previously only knew how to design boards with less powerful controllers. Now, I can incorporate STM32 controllers into my custom boards and program them.

metadata.context: Verified testimonials from students and professionals worldwide

profile.name: Israel Gbati
profile.title: Senior Firmware Engineer & Educator
profile.bio: Award-winning inventor and entrepreneur with 10+ years experience training 100,000+ professionals worldwide in embedded systems.

course.content:
Course: ARM GNU Assembly Programming From Ground Up™
Description: This is the GNU version of the popular ARM Assembly Programming From Ground Up™ 1 & 2 courses. Covering ARM Systems Design, Architecture, and Practical Assembly Programming, this is the most comprehensive ARM assembly course online.
Category: Start Here
Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

metadata.title: ARM GNU Assembly Programming From Ground Up™

course.content:
Course: STM32 Development Learning Path
Description: Master STM32CubeMX 5 and CubeIDE for embedded systems firmware and peripheral driver development, covering USB, PWM, SPI, ADC, UART, DMA, FreeRTOS, and bare-metal programming. Gain proficiency in STM32 HAL APIs, Low-Layer APIs, and ARM Cortex-M development boards.
Category: Start Here
Lessons: 45
Duration: 40 minutes

course.content:
Course: Embedded System IoT Systems Design
Description: Learn to build a complete IoT system from scratch, including firmware development, GUI dashboard creation, and cloud integration for data storage and device control.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 38
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded System IoT Systems Design

course.content:
Course: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Ethernet Programming
Description: Learn to write/configure drivers for the Ethernet peripheral and develop embedded Ethernet firmware for networking protocols like HTTP and DHCP. Master Ethernet driver development, peripheral configuration, and TCP/IP stack integration.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 45
Duration: 40 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Ethernet Programming

course.content:
Course: Embedded Systems Cellular Firmware Development(GSM)
Description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for adding cellular functionality to your embedded device using the STM32 microcontroller and the A6 GSM/GPRS chip. This course covers phone calls, SMS, M2M communication, and more.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded Systems Cellular Firmware Development(GSM)

course.content:
Course: Embedded Systems Design Patterns From Ground Up™
Description: Learn to apply design patterns to embedded firmware development, providing reusable solutions to common software problems. This course covers various design patterns through practical examples and real-world problem-solving.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 40
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded Systems Design Patterns From Ground Up™
metadata.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126092712-5876Embedded Systems Design Patterns From Ground Up™.webp

course.content:
Course: Embedded Wifi Bare-Metal Development From Ground Up™
Description: Learn to develop drivers and libraries for connecting embedded devices to the internet using STM32 and ESP8266. Master WIFI protocol, create efficient data structures, and build applications like web servers and clients.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 35
Duration: 40 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded Wifi Bare-Metal Development From Ground Up™
metadata.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230126094747-9455Embedded Wifi Bare-Metal Development From Ground Up™.webp

course.content:
Course: Embedded RFID/NFC Bare-Metal Development
Description: Learn to develop RFID/NFC firmware applications from scratch, including interfacing MIFARE MFRC522 NFC chips with STM32 microcontrollers. This course covers both theoretical concepts and practical implementation, including cloud connectivity.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded RFID/NFC Bare-Metal Development

course.content:
Course: NFC Desktop Application Development
Description: Learn Python essentials, GUI development with Kivy, and Firebase integration to build a complete NFC desktop application. This course covers everything from user authentication to cloud database storage.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 28
Duration: 20 minutes

metadata.title: NFC Desktop Application Development

course.content:
Course: Hands-On GPS Firmware Development
Description: Learn to develop bare-metal drivers and libraries for GPS systems, including parsing satellite data for longitude, latitude, and altitude. Master GPS module integration, data structures, and NMEA data parsing.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 45
Duration: 50 minutes

metadata.title: Hands-On GPS Firmware Development

course.content:
Course: Wireless System Development with nRF24
Description: Learn to build a complete wireless system using the nRF24L01 transceiver for data management and control. Develop drivers, modern GUI applications, and end-to-end systems for sensor data collection and storage.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

metadata.title: Wireless System Development with nRF24

course.content:
Course: Wireless System Development with nRF24
Description: Learn to build a complete wireless system for data management and control using the nRF24L01 transceiver. Develop end-to-end systems for sensor data collection and wireless peripherals like game controllers.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 38
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: Wireless System Development with nRF24

course.content:
Course: MQ Telemetry Transport (MQTT) From Ground Up
Description: Learn to develop complete IoT solutions using MQTT, a lightweight protocol for machine-to-machine communication. This course covers core MQTT concepts, Python essentials, driver development, and real-world applications.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

metadata.title: MQ Telemetry Transport (MQTT) From Ground Up

course.content:
Course: Advanced Embedded Systems Bare-Metal Programming Ground Up™
Description: Master advanced bare-metal programming with comprehensive guides on DMA, RTC, Watchdog Timer drivers, and debugging techniques. Enhance your skills in developing robust and efficient embedded solutions.

Lessons: 40
Duration: 45 minutes

Lessons: 35
Duration: 40 minutes

metadata.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230201034250-1348Embedded Build Systems with GNU Tools and Makefiles.jpg

course.content:
Course: 4G LTE IoT: Bare-Metal to HTTP, MQTT, SMS
Description: Learn to develop bare-metal firmware for STM32 microcontrollers interfacing with 4G LTE chips, and master HTTP, MQTT, and SMS protocols for IoT applications. This course covers server-side development, sensor data collection, and creating real-world IoT solutions.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 45
Duration: 50 minutes

metadata.title: 4G LTE IoT: Bare-Metal to HTTP, MQTT, SMS

course.content:
Course: WiFi IoT Architecture: From Firmware to Full Stack Web Development
Description: Transform into an IoT professional specializing in WiFi technologies. Learn to develop bare-metal firmware, handle sensor data, and design IoT devices with WiFi and 4G LTE connectivity.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 38
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: WiFi IoT Architecture: From Firmware to Full Stack Web Development

course.content:
Course: Embedded Memory Security: Protecting Your System from Tampering and Unauthorized Access
Description: Learn advanced techniques to secure embedded memory from unauthorized access and tampering, including MPU, Tamper Detection, and Read/Write Protection using Option Bytes. Ideal for professionals aiming to protect their embedded systems against security threats.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded Memory Security: Protecting Your System from Tampering and Unauthorized Access

course.content:
Course: Custom Cloud <> Python Gateway Communication
Description: Learn to integrate embedded systems with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using Python for effective UART communication and data management. Master Google Cloud Storage operations, Firebase NoSQL Database, and real-world IoT scenarios.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 40
Duration: 45 minutes

metadata.title: Custom Cloud <> Python Gateway Communication

course.content:
Course: Embedded Bootloader Development from Ground Up™
Description: Learn to develop custom bootloaders for STM32 microcontrollers, covering the build process, memory model, and linker scripts. Gain hands-on experience in creating multi-slot memory system bootloaders and implementing firmware updates.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 28
Duration: 25 minutes

metadata.title: Embedded Bootloader Development from Ground Up™

course.content:
Course: Master Firmware Updates with In-Application Programming(IAP)
Description: Learn to update devices remotely, fix bugs, and add new features with In-Application Programming (IAP). Gain expertise in developing IAP host applications in Python and designing advanced bare-metal bootloaders for STM32 microcontrollers.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 35
Duration: 40 minutes

metadata.title: Master Firmware Updates with In-Application Programming(IAP)

course.content:
Course: 4G LTE-Powered FOTA: Firmware Updates over Mobile Networks
Description: Learn to implement Firmware Update Over-the-Air (FOTA) using 4G LTE for reliable, remote updates. Master custom bootloader development, 4G LTE connectivity, and STM32 Flash memory management.
Category: Expert
Lessons: 40
Duration: 45 minutes

metadata.title: 4G LTE-Powered FOTA: Firmware Updates over Mobile Networks

Lessons: 32
Duration: 30 minutes

course.content:
Course: Mastering SD Card Bootloader Development

Lessons: 38
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: Mastering SD Card Bootloader Development

course.content:
Course: Advanced Audio Processing: Mastering I2S, Codecs, Audio Input, and Output

course.content:
Course: Embedded Audio Storage and Analysis: I2S, DMA, FFT, Spectrum Analysis, SD Card, FatFS, Recorder, Playback.
Description: Learn real-time audio capture, storage, analysis, and playback on STM32 systems using I2S, DMA, FFT, and SD cards. Develop skills for building spectrum analyzers, voice recorders, and advanced audio processing applications.

Lessons: 45
Duration: 50 minutes

Course: Wireless Firmware Update: Mastering FOTA with STM32 and ESP8266

course.content:

Lessons: 38
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: Extreme Embedded Firmware Engineering Learning Path

Lessons: 32

course.content:
Course: Mastering ARM TrustZone: Secure Embedded Systems with Cortex-M23/M33

course.content:
Course: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
Description: This course teaches you how to build a Real-Time Operating System (RTOS) through intensive practice and theory. By the end, you will be able to build your own RTOS from scratch, implement various schedulers, and understand the internals of an RTOS kernel.
Category: RTOS Programming
Lessons: 38
Duration: 35 minutes

metadata.title: Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1
metadata.image: https://be.embeddedexpert.io/public/storage/upload/books/230131075212-6213Build Your Own RealTime OS (RTOS 1) From Ground Up™ on ARM 1.webp

course.content:

Lessons: 45
Duration: 40 minutes

course.content:

Duration: 35 minutes
